name: ANWR GROUP eG
membership: Mittelstandsverbund - ZGV e.V., EHI Retail Institution GmbH, IHK, Genossenschaftsverband e.V., BVR, Bankenfachverband e.V., Deutscher Factoringverband e.V., Deutscher Franschiseverband e.V.
goal: The ANWR GROUP is in the industries of shoes, sports and leather goods of the most successful cooperative business networks in Europe. Our associations and franchise systems offer independent retailers customized services. The service divisions include EDI and inventory management, online and e-commerce, financial services, seminars and training. Furthermore, the ANWR GROUP offers a modern exhibition and Order Center.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
